TEXT.TITLE: CINEPLEX ODEON OFFICERS BUY SHARES FROM COMPANY
TEXT.BODY: <Cineplex Odeon Corp> said chairman Garth H. Drabinsky and vice chairman Myron I. Gottlieb have each purchased from the company's treasury 750,000 common shares at 17.50 dlrs each. Reuter
